titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on 4,4'-(hexafluoroisopropyldene)bis(phthalic anhydride).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2040)

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 4,4-(hexafluoroisopropylidene) bis-(phthalic anhydride).
